item.title: Our services
item.content:encoded:
We are small B2B IT company, we will help you with:

You just about to start your business:

  • Your backend and infrastructure design;
  • Initial POC and MVP software development;
  • Microservices, clouds and DevOps setup;

You want to refactor your product:

  • Software design;
  • Monolith splitting to the services;
  • Orchestration, load balancing etc.
item.author: ctiapps
